Reviews.Title: Very  GOOD
Reviews.Author: gibson
Reviews.Content: It  looks  like  you  have  a  light  on  at  night.Very  clear  and  long  distance.AlsoThe  price  is  very  good  to.

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: gotya28
Reviews.Content: We had high hopes for this camera! The cost was high but they made it sound great. Its junk!! The color in the day is great but at night its video loss!! No night vision! Why is it advertised with that feature? I cant wait to send it back in fact im done with night owl all together!

ProductInfo.Features:
Easily connects to any TV (RCA) or DVR (BNC)
Indoor/outdoor metal housing
LED Array technology. Energy efficient; evenly dispersed night vision
CCD 420 TVL
Includes: camera with stand and mounting hardware, UL power adapter, 60ft of video/power cable (white or black), BNC-RCA connector, 3 Night Owl security stickers
ProductInfo.Name: Night Owl Security CAM-LA-BS14420-B LED Array Outdoor Camera
